__e: Is that to say, John, that what you were doing was God's good work?
I'm the servant of the Lord, and I've got the strength of the Lord in my arms.
You come right out and ask that man of God.
Is that to say, John, that what you were doing was God's good work?
You come right out and ask that man of God.
I'm the servant of the Lord, and I've got the strength of the Lord in my arms.
We have created a society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift.
No handle to your name, perhaps... but horses and a servant of your own and all the rest that goes with it.
She goes to a house that she knows is a living misery... to a mistress that sees no difference between a servant and a slave. - And she will not be moved.
They have written to me asking that I investigate whether you are a servant of the devil.
SHE CAME TO NO GOOD. [Speaking Kukuana]
It is a rare privilege to become servant to the god of thunder.
